per_pixel_36=six = sin(x);

per_pixel_38=dx = dx + 0.01*sin(abs(12*y))*sin(time);
per_pixel_39=dy = dy + 0.01*sin(abs(12*x))*cos(time);
per_pixel_40=zoom = zoom + 0.0095*(sin(8+4*sin(0.2*time)*ang) + sin(sin(time*2*sin(time)*rad))*0.3 - cos(rad)*0.1);
per_pixel_41=rot = rot + 0.08*abs(0.746-rad)*sin(2.2*(0.5-rad)+5.7*sin(0.1*time));
per_pixel_42=sx = sx + 0.01*(0.99*1-rad)*sin(0.733*time)*below(sin(time),0);
per_pixel_43=sy = sy + 0.01*(0.99*1-rad)*cos(0.953*time)*above(sin(time),0);
per_pixel_44=zoom = zoom - 0.015*(0.5*abs(3)-rad)*below(rad,1.5);

per_pixel_46=//dx = equal(seg,1)*(x - .5)*2;

per_pixel_50=dy=sin(x*4.28+time*0.1)+sin(x*6.28*4+time*0.14)+sin(x*6.28*09+time*0.2);

per_pixel_58=
per_pixel_59=cr1=0;

per_pixel_61=crx=cr2-cr1;

per_pixel_63=cb=.25    +sin(time/5)/6;

per_pixel_65=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_66=crr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);
